domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

text: @elonmusk I think lockdown isn't a perfect way to wipe out Coronavirus . do we konw the scientist said ? no one care about the fact that Corona may comeback again in fall without vaccine…maybe use could learn something Sweden do ! i agree Elon ,time to free now !
